subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Kirby Hocutt was hired as Miami’s athletic director, replacing Paul Dee. Hocutt had been the athletic director at Ohio University since 2005. Hocutt, a former Kansas State linebacker, also spent six years in Oklahoma’s athletic department. Dee, Miami’s athletic director since 1993, announced plans to resign in May and was expected to join Miami’s faculty on June 1.
